title: Clinton sex trafficking code?
author: VD
content_html:
Mike Cernovich suspects there may be a code related to the Weiner files now in the possession of the FBI that is observable even in the existing Podesta emails.

Mike Cernovich@Cernovich
There are code words being used in those #PodestaEmails. I know this from criminal law background. Not sure on code, but it’s shady af.

Mike Cernovich@Cernovich
“I’m dreaming about your hotdog stand in Hawaii…”

This is code for something.

Sex trafficking?

Mike Cernovich@Cernovich
“I think it has a map that seems pizza-related.”

This is code. I know this from representing drug dealers.

Mike Cernovich@Cernovich
The Clintons were running a pedophile ring. It’s been in the emails all of the time. We just weren’t able to see the code.

Mike Cernovich@Cernovich
Some truly sick stuff going on in #PodestaEmails. It’s some sort of sex trafficking ring. That’s why Julian said these emails = prison.
